description: Recently, we were out in the North East hunting for fresh, new talent, when we came across these two; Lucky and Josh. Not a couple, but friends from way back; they occasionally meet up to remember old times.It turns out they used to suck each other off in high school during lunch sometimes. And that's what they still do. We asked if they would fuck each other, and you'll see they tried, but their cocks are just too big to give a comfortable slamming. The two wake up from a long night partying, but that doesn't stop them from diving into each others mouths and going for a quick morning fuck and suck. Hot oral, tight asses and two big loads always make for a happy wake-up.Enjoy.
title: Josh & Lucky
